body.name: COOFANDY Men's Cuban Guayabera Shirt Short Sleeve Button Down Shirts Casual Summer Beach Shirts
features: Premium Fabric --- Mens Short Sleeve Cuban Shirt is made of high quality material that is lightweight, comfortable and breathable. The soft fabric provides you skin-friendly feel all day.
Stylish Design --- The Cuban Guayabera Shirt features with short sleeve, spread collar, button down closure and vertical print design for a sophisticated look.
Collocation --- Casual Button Down Shirt is great for spring, summer or fall. You can match with shorts, swimming shorts, jeans or trousers for a casual look.

Occasions - Summer Beach Shirt is suitable for daily wear, beach, vacation, cruises, holiday, wedding, party, school, office, hawaiian, island, yoga, work or other casual activities. It is also an ideal gift for your family, husband and friends.
Warm Tips --- Machine wash. Please refer to our size chart carefully before you ordering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comes flat / vacuumed sealed. Once opened good quality for the money and the wrinkles worked themselves out. For the money, well worth it. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looser, Relaxed Fit; Could be cheaper
reviews.reviewText: I got this shirt before I went to Cabo Mexico. However, I ended up not going with it simply because I did not love how it fit me, nor did I like the synthetic material.The shirt is on the bigger, looser side. I am usually a large, but this large felt a bit too big for my preference. That has been my biggest issue with this COOFANDY brand. Sizing is never the same. If you want a really relaxed, loose fitting shirt then order true to size. If you want this shirt a bit more fitted, then I would size one down. It will not shrink in the washer or dryer.For the material, I think the shirt could be cheaper by about $10. It would be much better if it was a cotton-blend at the least. I just was not a fan of how it felt on my body. I also think it was not very breathable which was what I was looking for in a beach shirt.Overall, I think the shirt is decent and can look good if the sizing works for you. I think this shirt would be closer to 5 stars if sizing was more consistent and/or the price was knocked down about $10, or if a higher quality fabric material was used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It feels comfortable and looks nice. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking forward to receiving the shirt once ordered. My concern once received was on the packaging. The shirt was vacuum packed. A statement on the packaging stated "wrinkles could come out with washing". I chose to not open the package and returned it. The shirt looked great, I however wasn't going to take a chance on the wrinkle statement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars COOFANDY Cuban Guayabera Shirt: Island Vibes Done Right (5/5 stars)
reviews.reviewText: Sun's out, guayabera's out! I recently snagged a COOFANDY Cuban Guayabera Shirt, and let me tell you, it's transported me straight to a tropical paradise (figuratively speaking, of course). Here's why it gets a perfect 5-star rating from me:The Look:This shirt is pure island cool. The classic guayabera style with its pleated panels and mandarin collar screams Havana nights and mojito memories. I opted for the light blue color, which pops against a tan and feels effortlessly breezy.Comfort King:Forget stiff, starched button-downs. This guayabera is made from a soft, breathable linen blend that moves with you, not against you. It's like wearing a cloud, but a cloud that looks seriously stylish.True to Size:One of my biggest pet peeves is online shopping surprises. Not with COOFANDY! I followed the size chart, and the shirt fits like a dream. Relaxed without being baggy, it flatters my frame without feeling constricting.Quality Craftsmanship:The stitching is impeccable, the buttons are sturdy, and the fabric feels like it'll hold up to countless island adventures (or backyard barbecues, for now). Plus, it washes beautifully – no shrinkage or color fading to report here.Versatility Wins:This shirt isn't just for beachside lounging. It easily transitions from casual to dressy with a quick swap of shoes and accessories. I've rocked it with jeans and sandals for a laid-back look, and paired it with linen pants and boat shoes for a more polished night out.Overall:The COOFANDY Cuban Guayabera Shirt is a summer must-have. It's comfortable, stylish, versatile, and true to size. It's the perfect way to channel your inner islander, no matter where you are. Plus, at an affordable price point, it's a guilt-free indulgence.Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love the shirt, but the sleeve came apart in the initial wash (delicate cycle) so I need to spend more money to get it fixed BEFORE he can ever wear it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good looking and comfortable, with a classic style
reviews.reviewText: You might be surprised to know that a lot of people don't realize that there IS a difference between a classic Hawaiian shirt and a classic Cuban shirt.Unlike the bold colored tropical or floral prints of a typical Hawaiin shirt, Cuban shirts are more often made in solid colors, especially the earthy colors like greys, off whites, blue, green, or black.And unlike the flashy styling of the Hawaaian shirt, the classic Cuban shirts are either plain, or come with a more subdued stripe.So why did a dedicated Hawaaian shirt enthusiast order a COOFANDY Men's Cuban Guayabera Short Sleeve Button Down Shirt you might ask?Quite simple, really.My wife took one look at this shirt on Amazon and said, "I really like this shirt! I think it would look great on you!"And I said, "Well, then, let's order it"And it does look good.And it is comfortable.And it has a nice roomy fit, but still presents an almost tailored look.And the dusky deep (navy) blue is accented perfectly by the subdued silver grey striping.And it's well made, with nice stitching, and a not too heavy, not too light, fabric weight.So, if having a great looking shirt that brings all those other qualities into your wardrobe issomething you'd like, then you can't go wrong picking out one of the many colors of the COOFANDY Men's Cuban Guayabera Short Sleeve Button Down Shirts that are available.Get your wife or significant other to weigh in on this if you're still not convinced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable budget short sleeved button up
reviews.reviewText: The shirt arrived in a vacuum-packed plastic sleeve, so it was VERY folded. Once wash, the wrinkles were gone without issues.The fabric of the shirt is nice and fairly soft (not stiff, which is great). Lint doesn’t seem to stick to it more than most shirts. We’ll see how the material holds up over time.The fit of the shirt is great. I ordered a large and it fits me well; not boxy. Slightly slimmer in the waist, which looks good when left untucked (which is how this shirt is meant to be worn).The only issue I have is the design on it. I think it looks good, but it’s not stiched. The design itself is heat-pressed on, and it seems to be vinyl. An odd choice and I expect it to wear off over time, though we will see.In the end, I like the shirt, and I hope it will last me at least a dozen washes.
